summary: A polished, brand‑centric website for Countrypolitan that showcases its unique blend of antique, home, and garden furnishings. The site will feature a modern yet rustic layout, multiple informational and e‑commerce pages, rich media galleries, and a clear call‑to‑action for in‑store visits. The design will emphasize warm, earthy colors, wood textures, and elegant typography to reflect the shop’s country‑style aesthetic.
style_notes: Rustic country vibe: warm earth tones (deep browns, muted greens, terracotta), textured wood backgrounds, linen‑like accents. Typography: serif for headings (e.g., Playfair Display), clean sans‑serif for body (e.g., Open Sans). Use high‑contrast dark text on light backgrounds with subtle drop shadows. Hover effects on buttons with soft color transitions. Mobile‑first responsive grid, 12‑column layout, accessible color contrast.
assets_needed: Interior shots of antique items, furniture, garden décor
Seasonal décor displays (Fall, Winter, Spring, Summer)
Product images (multiple angles) for Shop page
Icon set for services and features
Google Maps embed for Store Locator
Short video clip of shop tour (optional)
